backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing fields, tasks, user profiles, and access control with user-role enforcement and CRUD operations for fields and tasks.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file describing implemented features, affected documentation, components, and test IDs for two deployment-related documentation updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of frontend source file paths to short functional descriptions covering components, hooks, dialogs, and UI behavior.
frontend/docs/deploy-and-localdev-regres: Comprehensive checklist for validating build, deployment, boot flow, authentication, and CRUD functionality in both local and production environments.
frontend/docs/field-create-failure-repro: Guide outlining reproducible steps for testing field-creation failure scenarios, mainly verifying expected behavior for anonymous users.
frontend/docs/production-redeploy-runboo: Runbook detailing prerequisites and procedures for performing a clean production redeploy with state capture and rollback readiness.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-pro: Focused smoke-test procedure for validating critical production functionality immediately after redeploy, aligned with the regression checklist.
frontend/docs/production-smoke-check-res: Template for recording production smoke test results covering app load, login, dashboard, CRUD operations, and data import/export.
frontend/docs/profile-save-failure-repro: Documentation describing a profile save error, its root cause, reproduction steps, and the implemented fixes with validation tests.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and pre-React bootstrap scripts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, boot error detection, retries, and rendering core UI pages and modals.
frontend/src/bootstrap/bootFallback.ts: Fallback system that displays a detailed error UI if the app fails before React mounts, with sanitization and diagnostics.
frontend/src/bootstrap/preReactGlobals.t: Bootstrap script that sets global environment shims and initializes boot fallback before React loads.
frontend/src/components/AllTasksView.tsx: Displays all tasks with search, sorting, and field name resolution, rendering task cards or loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/CreateFieldDialo: Dialog for creating a new field with name and background selection, handling authentication and backend readiness.
frontend/src/components/CreateTaskDialog: Dialog for creating a task with scale-based attributes, duration, and dependency selection, submitting to backend.
Dialog for editing a field's name, icon, color, and background, reloading values when opened and updating via mutation.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing task details, duration units, dependencies, and optionally moving tasks between fields.
frontend/src/components/FieldCard.tsx: Renders a field summary card showing icon, task count, and averaged attributes, styled with field color and background.
frontend/src/components/FieldDetailError: React error boundary that catches errors in the field detail view and displays a styled fallback with reset and back actions.
Displays a field's details and its tasks with filtering, sorting, creation, editing, and deletion controls.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling theme toggle, user identity display, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ImportDataConfir: Confirmation dialog warning users before overwriting all existing data during an import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen presenting app features and triggering Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile after authentication.
frontend/src/components/RecoverableBootE: UI for recoverable boot errors with retry, logout, and expandable diagnostic details.
frontend/src/components/SortDirectionTog: Button component that toggles ascending or descending sort order with tooltip feedback.
frontend/src/components/TaskCard.tsx: React component rendering a task card with completion, deletion, edit dialogs, dependency display, and attribute badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, storing identity, login/logout actions, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data such as user profiles, using a resilient actor and detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds an always-available actor with retry logic and invalidates dependent queries when the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, theming variables, and light/dark field background palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page handling field/task views, authentication state, search/sort, and import/export dialogs.
frontend/src/utils/bootErrorMessages.ts: Parses IC errors to extract readable messages and detects specific conditions like missing profiles or stopped canisters.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Utility to serialize data (handling BigInt) and trigger a JSON file download via a generated Blob URL.
frontend/src/utils/duration.ts: Functions to convert, format, and transform durations across minutes, hours, and days.
Normalizes export-user-data errors into categories with user-friendly messages for login, actor readiness, network, or backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/fieldAppearance.ts: Defines available field icons and colors and provides helpers to resolve icon components and color data safely.
Defines background color options for field cards and helpers to resolve background data and CSS variable names.
frontend/src/utils/fieldCreationErrors.t: Normalizes field-creation errors by detecting login, actor, authorization, or profile issues and producing friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/parseExportPayload.ts: Validates and converts exported JSON into typed Field and Task objects, restoring Principals and BigInt values.
frontend/src/utils/profileSaveErrors.ts: Normalizes profile save errors into clear categories and user-friendly messages based on message patterns and backend traps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and feature tasks related to improving production redeploy workflow and documentation.
